00030 class Bookmark
00031 {
00032 public:
00033     virtual int line() = 0;
00034     virtual QString file() = 0;
00035     virtual QString name() = 0; 
00036 protected:
00037     QString __name;
00038 };
00039 
00041 class ProjectBookmark : public Bookmark
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     ProjectBookmark( QString name, QString file, int line ) :  __line(line) 
00045         { __name = name; __file = file; }
00046     int line() { return __line; }
00047     QString file() { return __file; }
00048     virtual QString name() { return __name; }
00049     ScintillaBookmark *toScintillaBookmark();
00050 private:
00051     int __line;
00052     QString __file;
00053 };
00054 
00056 class ScintillaBookmark : public Bookmark
00057 {
00058 public:
00059     ScintillaBookmark( QString name, CUTEView *view, int i, bool isHandle=false ); 
00060     int line();
00061     QString file();
00062     QString name();
00063     ProjectBookmark* toProjectBookmark();
00064 private:
00065     CUTEView *__view;
00066     int handle;
00067 };
